name: telephonic

relating to or using a phone or a phone system: Despite my advance planning, I was briefly without any means of telephonic communication. Consent for the operation may be obtained in person at a hospital, or through a recorded telephonic conversation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe prisoners had no mail or telephonic contact with the outside world. They held telephonic interviews with the candidates before meeting some of them in person. The law is very strict when it comes to telephonic surveillance performed without a warrant.
